hero.headline: Professional Bilingual Website Design & Development
hero.subheadline: Custom websites in English, Spanish, or both languages. Responsive design and SEO optimization to reach global markets.

about.title: A Web Design Company Like No Other
about.text: Nuvana is a company committed to seeing your business succeed. Unlike other web design companies that just build websites and disappear, we genuinely care about your growth and success. We specialize in creating custom websites in English, Spanish, or both languages, with responsive designs and SEO-optimized solutions. Our mission isn't just to deliver a website—it's to deliver results that transform your business and help you reach new heights.

services.title: Professional Website Design Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive digital solutions tailored to your business needs
services.ctaNotice: Need a custom solution? We've got you covered.

items.title: Custom Website Development
items.desc: Professional custom website design and development tailored to your business needs and brand identity.

items.title: Responsive Web Design
items.desc: Mobile-friendly responsive websites that work perfectly on all devices and screen sizes for optimal user experience.

items.title: SEO & Digital Marketing
items.desc: Search engine optimization and digital marketing strategies to increase your online visibility and drive traffic.

items.title: Multilingual Website Solutions
items.desc: Expert website development in English, Spanish, or both languages to reach global markets and diverse audiences worldwide.

items.name: Multi Electric Supply Inc.
items.content: Nuvana transformed our online presence completely. Our customers love the new bilingual website and our online inquiries increased by 40%!

items.name: PR Decompression Centers
items.content: The new website has significantly increased our patient inquiries and improved our professional image. Excellent work by the Nuvana team!

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Nuvana for Your Website Design

reasons.title: Expert Website Development Team
reasons.desc: Our experienced web developers and designers create high-performance websites that drive results and increase conversions for your business.

reasons.title: Bilingual Website Specialists
reasons.desc: Specialized in creating fully bilingual websites that seamlessly serve both English and Spanish-speaking customers across Puerto Rico and Latin America.

reasons.title: Custom Website Solutions
reasons.desc: Every website is custom-built from the ground up to reflect your brand identity, meet your business objectives, and provide exceptional user experience.

reasons.title: Complete Website Support
reasons.desc: Comprehensive website maintenance, hosting, security updates, and ongoing optimization to ensure your website continues to perform at its best.

portfolio.title: Featured Projects
portfolio.subtitle: Discover our latest work and the impact we've created
portfolio.ctaNotice: Ready to create something amazing together?

sites.name: Multi Electric Supply Inc.
sites.desc: A comprehensive digital transformation for Puerto Rico's leading electrical supply distributor, featuring bilingual support and industrial-grade functionality.
sites.longDesc: Multi Electric Supply Inc. needed a modern, professional website to showcase their 20+ years of expertise in electrical supplies. We created a bilingual platform that serves both Spanish and English-speaking customers across Puerto Rico.
sites.testimonial: Nuvana transformed our online presence completely. Our customers love the new bilingual website!

sites.name: PR Decompression Centers
sites.desc: A sophisticated medical website for Puerto Rico's premier chiropractic and spinal decompression clinic, designed to build trust and convert patients.
sites.longDesc: PR Decompression Centers required a professional medical website that would establish credibility and help patients understand their advanced treatment options. We delivered a comprehensive platform with appointment booking and multilingual support.
sites.testimonial: The new website has significantly increased our patient inquiries and improved our professional image.
